author: geirm
msg: Big change is that introspection etc is handled at exec time ( via render() ) rather than setup through init.  Small change is that we save and restore the value of the loop reference if it exists...

author: geirm
msg: Rework introspection for context/thread safety.  Rework interaction between this and ASTReference.

author: geirm
msg: Context/thread safety for introspection.  Big rework on interaction between ASTIdentifier and ASTReference.

author: geirm
msg: Reworked introspection to avoid invoking objects as part of init/introspection, but all done only once at runtime.  So should be thread- and context-safe.
